name: Malaysian Tangy Noodle Salad
author: Cans Get You Cooking®
summary: A bite of this tangy noodle salad will help you feel fuller and satisfied longer, thanks to protein-packed canned chicken.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package thin rice noodles (vermicelli-style), uncooked
1 (14 ounce) can baby corn, drained, cut into thirds
1 (10 ounce) can chicken breast, drained and flaked
1 small red onion, halved and thinly sliced
½ cup dry roasted peanuts, coarsely chopped
⅓ cup Thai sweet red chili sauce
directions: Prepare noodle salad: Heat large saucepan of water to boiling
Add rice noodles; remove from heat
Drain and rinse in cold water
In large bowl combine noodles, baby corn, chicken, carrots, cucumber, red onion, cilantro, mint and peanuts
Prepare dressing: In small bowl combine sweet chili sauce, lime juice, soy sauce and ginger
Toss with noodle salad to mix well
